item.title: Jan 21st, 2024
item.description: I want to write about my code projects. Where can I do that? My Projects/Code

item.title: Jan 20th, 2024
item.description: This is my first page! I intend to use journals (pages titled with a date) as working spaces. All actual content should be on its own page. Things to note when working on this site: Logseq-schrodinger uses YAML for the Hugo front-matter. It will convert Logseq page-properties to Hugo front matter. Logseq keywords are lowercase converted to Hugo keywords, and category in Logseq is translated to categories for use with Hugo.
